verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
All things are ready
come to the feast,
come for the table
is now spread.
You famishing and
weary come,
and you shall be richly fed.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
All things are ready
come to the feast,
come for the door
is open wide.
A place of honor
is reserved,
for you at the
master's side.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
All things are ready
come to the feast,
come while he waits to
welcome you.
Delay not while
this day is yours,
tomorrow may never be.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
All things are ready,
come to the feast,
leave every care and
worldly strive.
Come feast upon
the love of God,
and drink everlasting life.
